food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 I am the color of sunshine.
🍌 You peel my skin.

food.question: I am round and often red, but sometimes green or yellow. Doctors say I keep them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 My name starts with the letter 'A'.
🌱 I grow on trees.
🩺 Eating me is good for you.

food.question: I am long, orange, and rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me!
🧡 I am a root vegetable.
🌱 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Kittens love me.
🐄 I come from an animal.
🥣 I am a liquid.

food.question: I am small and round, and often green or purple. I grow in bunches and are yummy to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am a fruit.
🪴 I grow on vines.
✋ You eat me one by one from a bunch.

food.question: I am a type of bread; you can put jam or peanut butter on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make a sandwich with me.
🌾 I am made from wheat.
🔥 You can toast me.

food.question: I'm a fruit with a fuzzy skin. Inside, I'm green and have tiny black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I start with the letter K, but I'm not a King.
🇨🇳 I come from China.
🌱 I grow on a vine.

food.question: I am a treat that’s often brown. I can be soft or have a crunch. What am I?

hints.text: 🍪 You might eat me with milk.
🍫 I often have chocolate chips.
🔥 You bake me in the oven.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green.
🌳 I look like tiny trees.
🥗 I can be eaten raw in salads.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, cut into strips, and fried until golden and crispy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You often eat me with ketchup.
🥔 I start as a potato.
🔥 I am cooked in hot oil.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
💛 I give you light and warmth.
🌞 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, and sometimes you can see me at night. I change shape. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
🧀 People sometimes say I am made of cheese!
🐺 Werewolves howl at me.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky. I am very far away and very hot. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I look small because I am so far away.
🌟 I am like the Sun, but much further away.
🔭 You can see many of me if you use a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am big and round and I go around the Sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I am the third planet from the sun.
💧 I have lots of water.
🌳 I am home to plants, animals, and people.

cosmos.question: I am a planet, and I am red and dusty. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People might want to visit me one day!
🍫 I am the color of rust.
🔴 Some people call me the 'Red Planet'.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of them look like animals.
🌠 People used to use me to find their way.
🌌 Some famous ones are the Big Dipper and Orion.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system. I have a big red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ My red spot is a giant storm!
🪐 I am made of gas, not rock.
🟠 I have many moons!

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me that are made of ice and rock. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide.
🌬️ I am also a gas giant.
💫 I am not the only planet with rings, but mine are the brightest.

cosmos.question: I am a very big group of stars, gas, and dust, and our sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am shaped like a spiral.
🌌 There are many other ones like me in the universe.
🥛 Our Solar System is a tiny part of me and I am called the Milky Way

cosmos.question: I am a shooting star that is really a small, rocky object that burns up in the Earth's atmosphere. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ People often make wishes when they see me.
🔥 I create a bright streak of light.
✨ I am smaller than an asteroid and I vaporise when I enter the atmosphere
